tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE protein_secondary_structure (
    protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_name VARCHAR(255),
    secondary_structure VARCHAR(512)
)

CREATE TABLE secondary_structures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_id INT,
    structure_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_position INT,
    end_position INT
);

CREATE TABLE Protein_Locations (
    location_id INT,
    protein_id INT,
    location_description VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);
CREATE TABLE Researcher (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Protein (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, sequence TEXT NOT NULL, researcher_id INT REFERENCES Researcher(id) ON DELETE CASCADE)
CREATE TABLE SecondaryStructure (id INT PRIMARY KEY, type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE ProteinStructure (id INT PRIMARY KEY, protein_id INT REFERENCES Protein(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, ss_id INT REFERENCES SecondaryStructure(id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE ProteinInteraction (id INT PRIMARY KEY, protein1_id INT REFERENCES Protein(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, protein2_id INT REFERENCES Protein(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
